entry.content:
Some notes on setting up Pelican on github

So I decided to set up a blog. Not for the first time! We shall see if this survives!

Pelican is an Python package that generates static webpages. Docs are here

So a few links I used to set this up:

Blog page from Erik O'Shaughnessy

Some lessons learned:

No spaces between [] and () when making links! Dates need to be US format? (I will look at this) Need to specify URL in both pelicanconf and publish conf I set up ssh access to github and then wrote a mini bash cript to automate. Then I can just edit files in content and publish.
